data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Ajaria prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ajaria, Georgia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Ajaria, Georgia. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, make the 5,017 believers in Ajaria to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 364,982 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Ajaria. Through your servants plant 74 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Uzbek, Northern people might believe through him.
Lord we pray you unite the 5,017 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Ajaria.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Ajaria, Georgia into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ajaria, Georgia has a population of 370,000.

We estimate Ajaria has 5,017 people who might know Jesus, 292,672 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 72,310 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 73 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Ajaria. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
